issue.status_text: none
issue.description: Potential inversion in Mm Build 37 reference component BX649287.10 disrupts representation of GeneID: 237029 (4932411N23Rik).
issue.resolution_text: Reference component BX649287.10 has been updated to BX649287.11, fixing the reported inversion. This change will be reflected in Mm Build 38.

issue.summary: Alignment problems between several clones in updated region of TPF causing contig building errors
issue.status_text: none
issue.description: Alignment problems between several clones in updated region of TPF causing contig building errors
issue.resolution_text: Type 2 gaps have been inserted between clones causing the alignment problems as they have been found not to share an overlap.

issue.summary: Lack of alignment between CT868692.7/CU633443.2 causing contig building problems
issue.status_text: none
issue.description: Lack of alignment between adjacent TPF components CT868692.7/CU633443.2 causing contig building problems
issue.resolution_text: A type 2 gap has been inserted between clones CT868692 and CU633443 as these clones have been found not to share an overlap.

issue.summary: Inconsistent orientations in alignments involving CU468274.10 are disrupting contig building
issue.status_text: none
issue.description: Inconsistent orientations in alignments involving CU468274.10 and adjacent TPF components are disrupting contig building
issue.resolution_text: The overlap between BX322590 and CU468274 is good, however there is no overlap between CU468274 and CT027595 so a tyoe 2 gap has been inserted for contig building purposes.

issue.summary: Multiple problems in region of CT867956.14 to CT867957.7 causing contig bldg problems
issue.status_text: none
issue.description: Multiple problems in region of CT867956.14 to CT867957.7 causing contig bldg problems
issue.resolution_text: Type 2 gaps have been inserted in this region to resolve the contig building issues

issue.summary: Lack of alignment between CT868721.10/CU013521.17 causing contig building problems
issue.status_text: none
issue.description: Lack of alignment between adjacent TPF components CT868721.10/CU013521.17 causing contig building problems
issue.resolution_text: CT868721.10 was removed from the TPF allowing the contig to build

issue.summary: Lack of alignment between AL808122.5 and AL831777.5 causing contig building problems
issue.status_text: none
issue.description: Lack of alignment between adjacent TPF components AL808122.5 and AL831777.5 causing contig building problems
issue.resolution_text: A type 2 gap has been inserted between AL808122 and AL831777

issue.summary: WGS to span missing clone sequence between BX284683.8 and AL669898.17
issue.status_text: none
issue.description: WGS may be used to span missing clone sequence between BX284683.8 and AL669898.17
issue.resolution_text: The gap here has been closed by the addition of CU682339.17 and FO907129.2 to the TPF. These components replace the WGS components which were used to span the gap for GRCm38 (CAAA01156039.1, CAAA01000181.1, CAAA01000182.1, CAAA01175342.1, CAAA01156804.1, CAAA01000183.1, CAAA01000184.1, CAAA01000185.1, CAAA01000186.1, CAAA01000187.1, CAAA01000188.1, CAAA01000189.1)

issue.summary: Should unlocalized chr. X component CR387995.6 remain in assembly?
issue.status_text: none
issue.description: Should unlocalized chr. X component CR387995.6 remain in the assembly?
issue.resolution_text: CR387995.6 (RP23-18L17), the sole component of MGSCv37 chr. X unlocalized scaffold NT_166333.1 is completely redundant under 3 clones that are in MGSCv37 chr. X (BX679667.8 (RP24-424A15), BX571759.9 (RP23-256J1) and BX890554.6 (RP23-291C10)). It will not be retained in future assemblies.

issue.summary: Should unlocalized chr. X component CR478124.1 remain in assembly?
issue.status_text: none
issue.description: Should unlocalized chr. X component CR478124.1 remain in assembly?
issue.resolution_text: CR478124.1 (WI1-2228E5), the sole component of MGSCv37 chr. X unlocalized scaffold NT_166334.1, is a chimeric clone that is redundant under components on chr. 12 (AC159642.2) and chr. X (AL833800.6 ). It will not be retained in future assemblies.

issue.summary: Should unlocalized chr. X component CR478172.2 remain in assembly?
issue.status_text: none
issue.description: Should unlocalized chr. X component CR478172.2 remain in assembly?
issue.resolution_text: CR478172.2 (WI1-2444B2), the sole component of MGSCv37 chr. X unlocalized scaffold NT_166335.1 has now been localized to chr. 6, but is made completely redundant by AC118025. It will not be retained in future assemblies.

issue.status_text: none
issue.description: Should unlocalized chr. X component CR478234.3 remain in assembly?

issue.status_text: none
issue.description: Should unlocalized chr. X component CR478352.2 remain in assembly?
issue.resolution_text: CR478352.2 (WI1-1892F9), the sole component of MGSCv37 chr. X unlocalized scaffold NT_166337.1, is a chimeric clone that is redundant under components on that are now on chr. 15 (AC156573.3 (RP23-133P6)) and chr. X (CR954300.4 (WI1-2788A17)). It will not be retained in future assemblies.

issue.status_text: none

issue.resolution_text: CR753826.2 (WI1-2132P11), the sole component of MGSCv37 chr. X unlocalized scaffold NT_166339.1, is a chimeric clone that is redundant under components on that are now on chr. 8 (AC128663) and chr. X (AL807398). It will not be retained in future assemblies.

issue.summary: Should unlocalized chr. X component CT954253.4 remain in assembly?
issue.status_text: none

issue.resolution_text: CT954253.4 (RP24-423I3), the sole component of MGSCv37 chr. X unlocalized scaffold NT_166342.1, has now been localized on chr. X, but is made completely redundant by the following components: CR556704.4 (RP23-324J18), CR846091.3 (RP24-264L21), BX294196.6 (RP23-247H18) and BX322648.16 (RP23-29L22). issue.status_text: Multiple clones have been selected to try and capture the sequence from the PAR region, which will hopefully include sequence for this missing gene.
issue.description:
mRNA AB512670.1 represents C57BL/6 sequence for the Asmt (Hiomt) gene; it has no hit in the current assembly or aligns to any BACs. NW_001038117.1 is its best hit in Celera, but that's a partial hit (nt 414-760). PMID: 20308563 says the gene is in the PAR region and is involved in melatonin synthesis. [landrum]
Related Accessions: AB512670.1: related transcript AAHY01198820.1: current best match

issue.status_text: none
issue.description: Housekeeping ticket for representation of PAR in GRCm38
issue.resolution_text: The extents of the PAR regions defined for GRCm38 chr. X (NC_000086.7 nt: 169969759-170931299) and NC_000087.7 ( nt: 90745845-91644698) are comprised of different sequence, and are slightly different in length, but are consistent with one another. The PAR regions align in the sequence immediately adjacent to the boundary.

issue.status_text: none
issue.description: NM_027700.1 has two hits on NT_111910.3. One is complete but the poorer match, and corresponds to GeneID: 100504039. The second hit is to CR954300.4 at 100% identity, but partial with the last exon falling off the end of the scaffold. I didn't find any accessions that currently represent the last exon, but it is found in Celera AAHY01210406.1 which might be useful for locating a suitable clone to extend NT_111910.3.
